Title: Bhooter Bhabishyat
Writer: Anik Datta (dialogue), Anik Datta (screenplay), Anik Datta (story), Deb Roy (dialogue), Deb Roy (screenplay assistance)
Actors: Swastika Mukherjee, Parambrata Chatterjee, Sabyasachi Chakraborty, Samadarshi Dutta
Plot: A rib-tickling comedy about a group of spirits who, in their various idiosyncrasies, try and save their only haunt, their resting place, when some unscrupulous builders try and break it down to build a modern monstrosity.
